description: This file defines a React component called RegisterPage, which presents a user registration form with validation, handles form submission, manages navigation upon successful registration, and displays error messages and toasts.

methods.name: RegisterPage()
methods.description: React functional component that provides a registration page with form validation, toast notifications, and navigation.

methods.name: handleSubmit
methods.description: Asynchronous function handling form submission: registers a user, shows success/error toasts, and navigates to appropriate page.
